permNodes.name: upload_image
permNodes.description: Allow a user to upload a image that may be public

permNodes.name: upload_image_private
permNodes.description: Allows a user to upload private images

permNodes.name: image_data
permNodes.description: Allows a user to request basic image data

permNodes.name: image_delete
permNodes.description: Allows a user to delete an image

permNodes.name: image_delete_private
permNodes.description: Allows a user to delete images that are his own

permNodes.name: image_tags
permNodes.description: Allows a user to add tags to images, that are either his own or public

permNodes.name: image_tags_delete
permNodes.description: Allows a user to remove tags from images, that are either his own Images or public ones
